_sText:
A remake of Ratatoing, using snowy textures.

The map is pretty much re-made in general

>i've cleaned up the edges
>fixed the water (hopefully)
>added some secret trigger_pushes at the top,
>cleaned up the spawn
>added a game_player_equip
>made the rainbow lights pulse
>fixed the lighting, no longer clicking it randomly, im now adding it precisely on the grid
>added breakable 'ice'
>Adding falling snow
>and of course changed the textures to suit the snowy theme
